column1: As a super office user I would like to be informed about the alarms in my user so I can have the most preferred alarm on top. *Acceptance criteria* Given I select an alarm When a profile (or profiles) contain an Then the system displays a page with the alarm *Scope* * Add weight (eg 0) when profile settings is not used in a alarm As a marketing managerI would like to be informed about the total amount of alarms in my userbaseso I can keep track of. *Acceptance criteria* Given I am on the backend pageWhen I select gather statisticsThen the system displays a pages with the alarms*Scope* * Use rest services for everything
